name: Ancients And Treasures
description:
*This game was made during the VimJam2 game jam*

Take control of one of the 3 legendary champions in their quest to cleanse the land of the evil wraith known as the Executioner Gz'hot.

Features:

  • Fully flashed character with a choice of 2 weapons, unique abillities and mechanics. (2 more characters are coming!)
  • Fight 3 difficult bosses, each with their own challenges and attacks.
  • Amazing chiptune soundtrack (courtesy of simon13666)
  • Be careful, but move quickly as the dark energy of the temple will empower the bosses, and will make the fights harder!
